actions.text: On agreeing to the Thompson (MS) amendments (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 215 - 198 (Roll no. 168).

description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 117-320 as en bloc: Nos. 1, 2, 4, 6, 7, and 8.
purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 1, 2, 4, 6, 7, and 8, printed in Part B of House Report 117-320.
